Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Considering its unparalleled features and craftsmanship, I believe it's worth every penny of its $15000 value. I kindly invite you to consider this extraordinary opportunity to own something truly remarkable. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to potentially serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
